author: Rhett Allain
title: The Promising Math Behind ‘Flattening the Curve’
description: Infectious diseases spread exponentially, yes, but only in the beginning. Thank God.
content: Last week I wrote about the alarming math of a viral pandemic. We talked about how infectious diseases spread exponentially, not linearlyand how that can make what seems, for weeks, like a small problem suddenly very, very big. Thats the challenge faced by le… [+1875 chars]
